description: Package mapping for Meteor 2.x to 3.x migration status and suggestions

alanning:roles.notes: Built into Meteor 3 core. Update imports from 'meteor/alanning:roles' to 'meteor/roles' and use async versions of methods.

aldeed:collection2.notes: Schema validation needs manual refactor. Consider simpl-schema for client-side validation and collection2-core for server-side.

dburles:collection-helpers.notes: Use native Meteor 3 collection transforms or create utility functions instead.

iron:router.notes: Iron Router is not maintained. Migrate to modern client-side routing solutions.

kadira:flow-router.notes: Original Flow Router is unmaintained. Consider ostrio:flow-router-extra or modern client-side routing.

meteor/accounts-password.notes: Works with Meteor 3. Make sure to use async versions of methods.

meteor/accounts-ui.notes: Blaze-based UI. Consider modern UI frameworks or custom implementation.

meteorhacks:fast-render.notes: Fast Render doesn't work with Meteor 3. Consider server-side rendering solutions.

matb33:collection-hooks.notes: May need updates for Meteor 3 async operations. Test thoroughly or implement custom hooks.

reywood:publish-composite.notes: May need updates for async compatibility. Consider restructuring publications.

aldeed:autoform.notes: Blaze-based forms. Migrate to modern form libraries for React/Vue.

peerlibrary:blaze-components.notes: Consider migrating to modern component frameworks.

ostrio:files.notes: Should work with Meteor 3 with async method updates.

meteor/reactive-var.notes: Core Meteor package, works with Meteor 3.

meteor/reactive-dict.notes: Core Meteor package, works with Meteor 3.
